LanguageData.MSS_MRStreamer: Rimworld: Deep Space Rim by Mr Samuel Streamer on Youtube
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_DrawByMrStreamer: Show "By Mr Samuel Streamer" label in the bottom left (only used to disuade video theft and other digital larceny, leave disabled)
LanguageData.MSSFP_RGSettingsCategory: Mr Samuel Streamer Flavour Pack - Resource Generator
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_OverrideRelicPool: Override the possible pool of relics with this mods list
LanguageData.MSS_FP_RitualOutcomeExtraDesc_Skylantern: Your skylanterns landed in a {0} colony, setting widespread fires and causing immense damage. They're here for revenge.
LanguageData.MSSFP_LoversRetreadText: {0} and {1} have left the colony to spend some time alone. They'll be back in about {2} hours.
LanguageData.MSSFP_LeapTooFar: frogge can't jump this far (max range {0} tiles)
LanguageData.MSSFP_LeapNoFuel: frogge doesn't have enough gems to power their leap (only {0}/{1})
LanguageData.MSS_BirthdayPickGene: Choose a {1} gene for {0_nameDef} to gain via mutation
LanguageData.MSS_FP_GeneEventChance_Tooltop: The chance for gene selections to appear on e.g. growth moments
LanguageData.MSS_FP_GoodGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give good genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_BadGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give bad genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_NeutralGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give neutral genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_RandomGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give random genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_RetirementWillProduce: Grandma is clacking away with the knitting needles and will have between {0} and {1} silver worth of knick-knacks ready for you in {2}
LanguageData.MSSFP_DeadPawnFromOutpost: After their passing, {0} is being returned from {1} to the colony for proper burial.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_RetirementNoOldPeopleDesc: All the retirees in {0} have moved on. Production is halted.
LanguageData.MSSFP_LostBrainPower: {0} lost some experience in {1} when their brain matter was fired out their head-cannon.
LanguageData.MSSFP_LostBrainPowerDamaged: With no experience left in {1}, {0} lost an important part of their brain when it was fired out of their head-cannon.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_DaysForOutpostFission: Days between fissions in outposts -> {0} days
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_SingleUseMentalFuses: Patch the Altered Carbon 2 Mental Fuse to be single use
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_DisableBSIncorporateGene: Disable the complexity limit for the B&S Incorporate gene
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_EnableExtendedMetabolism: Enable extended metabolism multiplier based on gene complexity (above 225%)
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_EnableNonsenseIncidents: Enable the nonsense events (e.g. Scrungle has been Bloorped).
LanguageData.MSS_Bigger_Desc: Incorporation has lead to a size increase of {0}
LanguageData.MSSFP_PawnsSleptInBed: Pawns that have slept in this bed:
LanguageData.MSSFP_PawnsLovedInBed: Pawns that have got some lovin' in this bed:
LanguageData.MSSFP_PawnsConcievedInBed: Pawns that were conceived in this bed:
LanguageData.MSSFP_TrekPodCrash: {PAWN_titleIndef} named {PAWN_nameDef} is crashing in a transport pod nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} survives the impact, {PAWN_pronoun} will be badly wounded.
LanguageData.MSSFP_TrekPodCrash_Factionless: {PAWN_nameDef} is not affiliated with any faction. You can rescue {PAWN_objective} and hope {PAWN_pronoun} joins freely, or capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.MSSFP_RitualObligationTargetWorker_Thing: {0} not found within {1} tiles of a {1}
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_EnableGeneStealerNeed: Enable the Gene Stealer need for the Big and Small Incorporate Gene
LanguageData.MSSFP_TrekBeamerLetterText: Shortly after getting some lovin', {PAWN_nameFull}, in a rushed tone apologised, and announced that {PAWN_possessive} people needed {PAWN_objective}, before promptly dematerializing
LanguageData.MSSFP_HasDirt: There's a little dirt under the pillow
LanguageData.MSSFP_DoesNotHaveDirt: The pillow has no dirt under it
LanguageData.MSSFP_DirtManVisitLetterLabel: dirt man has come to town
LanguageData.MSSFP_DirtManVisitLetterText: you didn't put any dirt under your pillow did you?
LanguageData.MSSFP_DirtManNoVisitLetterLabel: dirt man has come to town
LanguageData.MSSFP_DirtManNoVisitLetterText: you put any dirt under your pillow, so you're safe
LanguageData.MSSFP_DirtManEatingText: {0} is being eaten by a frogge!
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_EnableGenesOnGrowthMomen: Enable giving new genes on growth moments
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_EnableGeneMutators: Enable gene mutators, e.g Heat Wave has a chance to give heat related genes
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_WanderDelaySeconds_Toolt: Modify the delay before pawns start wandering around the map
LanguageData.MSSFP_10SecondsToSpeed_Tooltip: When enabled, automatically switches to ultrafast speed after 10 seconds of any other speed setting. Press 5 to toggle.
